title: "$trinity console" not work

### What is wrong?

Please include information like:

* full output of the error you received:
trinity: error: argument subcommand: invalid choice: 'console' (choose from 'fix-unclean-shutdown', 'attach'

* what command you ran : $trinity console

* the code that caused the failure (see [this link](https://help.github.com/articles/basic-writing-and-formatting-syntax/) for help with formatting code)


### How can it be fixed

Fill this in if you know how to fix it.

Apologies. The quickstart was not up to date and used an outdated, removed command. This doc update should get you unstuck.

https://github.com/ethereum/py-evm/pull/1544
